Question: How can I calculate the sum of an array in Java?
Please using this api: Arrays.stream.
Answer:<<<api>>>: Arrays.stream
<<<code>>>: int[] array = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
int sum = Arrays.stream(array).sum();
<<<explanation>>>: The sum() method of the IntStream class returns the sum of elements in this stream. This is a special case of a reduction. This is a terminal operation.

Question: How can I get the player count of a server?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getPlayers().
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getPlayers()
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> players = ping.getPlayers();
while (players.hasNext()) {
Player player = players.next();
System.out.println(player.getWorld().getName());
<<<explanation>>>: The getPlayers() method returns an iterator of all players on the server.
Question: How can I get the max players of a server?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getMaxPlayers().
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getMaxPlayers()
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
System.out.println(ping.getMaxPlayers());
<<<explanation>>>: The getMaxPlayers() method returns the maximum number of players on the server.
Question: How can I get the online players of a server?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers().
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers()
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> onlinePlayers = ping.getOnlinePlayers();
System.out.println(onlinePlayers.next().getName());
<<<explanation>>>: The getOnlinePlayers() method returns an iterator of all online players on the server.
Question: How can I get the online players of a server with a specific world?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world).
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world)
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> onlinePlayers = ping.getOnlinePlayers(World.getWorld("world"));
<<<explanation>>>: The getOnlinePlayers(World world) method returns an iterator of all online players on the server with the specified world.
Question: How can I get the online players of a server with a specific world and a specific location?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location).
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location)
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> onlinePlayers = ping.getOnlinePlayers(World.getWorld("world"), location);
<<<explanation>>>: The getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location) method returns an iterator of all online players on the server with the specified world and location.
Question: How can I get the online players of a server with a specific world and a specific location with a specific radius?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius).
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius)
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> onlinePlayers = ping.getOnlinePlayers(World.getWorld("world"), location, 10);
<<<explanation>>>: The getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius) method returns an iterator of all online players on the server with the specified world and location within a radius of the specified radius.
Question: How can I get the online players of a server with a specific world and a specific location with a specific radius with a specific player?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius, Player player).
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius, Player player)
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> onlinePlayers = ping.getOnlinePlayers(World.getWorld("world"), location, 10, player);
<<<explanation>>>: The getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius, Player player) method returns an iterator of all online players on the server with the specified world and location within a radius of the specified radius and the specified player.
Question: How can I get the online players of a server with a specific world and a specific location with a specific radius with a specific player and a specific player?
Please using this api: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius, Player player1, Player player2).
Answer:<<<api>>>: ServerListPing.getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius, Player player1, Player player2)
<<<code>>>: ServerListPing ping = Bukkit.getServerList().getPing(new Location(World.getWorld("world"), 0, 0, 0));
Iterator<Player> onlinePlayers = ping.getOnlinePlayers(World.getWorld("world"), location, 10, player1, player2);
<<<explanation>>>: The getOnlinePlayers(World world, Location location, double radius, Player player1, Player player2) method returns an iterator of all online players on the server with the specified world and location within a radius of the specified radius and the specified player1 and player2.
